originalText.text: Brian and his team made our home purchase a breeze. Their professionalism, expertise, and proactive approach were outstanding. Brian's clear communication and attention to detail instilled confidence in our decisions. In summary, a 5-star experience. Thanks, Brian, for making the home-buying journey an amazing one for me and my wife, Alexia!

originalText.text: Brian and his team were excellent. They are reliable and life saver for my situation. Thank you for your assistance throughout the loan process. I will certainly recommend your services to anyone I know who needs a mortgage.

text.text: Brian and his team were excellent. They are reliable and life saver for my situation. Thank you for your assistance throughout the loan process. I will certainly recommend your services to anyone I know who needs a mortgage.

originalText.text: The mortgage process was such a headache with other lenders and after months of already having another lender in place, we were told close to 1 month before closing that the lender did not want to follow through because the apartment was a new build (something that was known months before). We were extremely stressed and coming to terms with losing the apartment we loved, but we were referred to Brian and GR Affinity and it was the best decision we ever made. Brian was so efficient and even would email us back during off hours, which made us confident he was working so hard to make sure we could go through the process before our closing date in less than a month—a feat that seemed almost impossible. He was very attentive and reassuring which is exactly what a stressed first time home buyer needs! I would 100% recommended Brian and GR Affinity for your lending needs!

originalText.text: Brian and his team were excellent in working with us to procure a competitive loan/mortgage and shepherded us through the process from start to finish.  The online applications /tools made the process paper free and therefore much easier and efficient.  We were recommended Brian by our real estate lawyer and were very happy we went with Brian and GR Affinity.  We have closed on our apartment and it went very smoothly.

The online applications /tools made the process paper free and therefore much easier and efficient. originalText.text: The mortgage process can be pretty rough at times (I sometimes wondered if I could provide any more information), but Brian Cohen and his team did an amazing job in delivering our mortgage at an exceptional rate in order for us to close our apartment!   Brian was super responsive and helped us navigate the underwriting process to a successful conclusion.   GR Affinity's portal allowed for easy uploads of information, and everything was transparent for us to see.  I have no hesitation in recommending Brian Cohen and GR Affinity to handle your mortgage needs!
